name: hideous solitaire
description:
it's just solitaire but  when you win you get a random ~sticker~ :) you might get a rare ~holographic edition~

generate visual clutter until it hurts your eyes too much to play! then try to find the save file so you can delete it and start over. i don't like playing solitaire that much but i hope you will like this.

this winter is really hard because of personal/family reasons but getting back into my childhood obsession with weird computer stuff has been a really good outlet / distraction. if you can afford to donate a bit for the download that would be super good and it would help me and my partner out a lot. ♥️♥️

i want to make a phone version later!

i used löve
